trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when role validation fails due to a specified identity that is not contained in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowAuthorizationException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowAuthorizationException"></xref> class using the specified message.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowAuthorizationException"></xref> class by using serialized data.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowAuthorizationException"></xref> class by using the specified message and <xref:System.Exception>.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowAuthorizationException"></xref> class using the name of the activity and the principal.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in which the exception occurred.
The name of the user or entity on whose behalf the workflow authorization exception was thrown.
